document.full_text: the cannes film festival expelled danish director lars von trier on thursday for jokingly calling himself a nazi and hitler sympathizer, leaving the world's biggest cinema showcase in a state of shock.
document.title: cannes expels "shocked" von trier for hitler remarks
lines_and_colors: the cannes film festival expelled danish director lars von trier on thursday for jokingly calling himself a nazi and hitler sympathizer, leaving the world's biggest cinema showcase in a state of shock.
